summary: An ENB for those craving a game like Unreal's screenshots. but can't quite find it. (I was one of those people)
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://farm1.staticflickr.com/569/20990712204_ce2b21b69f_c.jpg[/img]

I built this ENB from the ground with the exception of the weather files which DrDocter so graciously let me use. This ENBs focus is on making skyrim look like Unreal's over [url=http://www.asot.es/2001/09/skyrim-mods.html]here[/url]. I worked hard on it and I hope you enjoy it. Please consider that this is a CONTINUOUS work in progress. Also consider that I have a life so if I don't update this regularly don't be alarmed.

My other ENB: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68937/?]Trinity ENB[/url]



Installation:

1. Download enbseries 0.279 from http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0279.htm
2. Extract ONLY the d3d9.dll and ENBHost.exe file and place them in your skyrim directory.( The place that has TESV.exe and Skyrim Launcher.exe                                                                                                                                                     files)
3. Download these mods and install them in this order to get the intended effect:
    [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates of Tamriel[/url] by JJC71 (Select the Nights level 2 option)
    [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27022]Supreme Storms[/url] by MannyGT (This is optional but HIGHLY recommended)
    [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39799]Climates of Tamriel Weather Patch[/url] by prod80 ( Select Regular Edition, Nights Level 2 and Snow brightness %40. Select Dragonborn option if you                                                                                        have the DLC. Select Supreme storms if you downloaded Supreme Storms.)
     [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63478]True Storms[/url] by fadingsignal (Select COT Weather Patch and Supreme Storms weather patch if you have Supreme Storms downloaded)
     [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15506]Minty Lightning During Storms[/url] by Minty (Optional)
     [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25675]Minty Lightning During Storms COT Patch[/url] by Minty(Only if using main mod)
    [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/?]Realistic Lighting OverHaul[/url] by The Realistic Lighting Team
    
     [font=Verdana][color=#ff0000][size=6]OR
[/size][/color][/font]     
     [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043]Enhanced Lights And FX[/url] by anamorfus(Make sure you turn of Exteriors)
     Use LOOT to sort your Mod Order (Mod Organzier users have a built in mod sorter [url=http://prntscr.com/86zysw]Here[/url])
4. Drop ENB files from the zip to your skyrim directory
5. Set your skyrimprefs.ini (Located by default C:/Users/xxxxxxx/Documents/My Games/Skyrim)
    iMultiSample=0
    bTreesReceiveShadows=1
    bDrawLandShadows=1
    fGamma=1.4000
    bShadowsOnGrass=1
    bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
6. Set your enblocal.ini to your VRAM here:
    VideoMemorySize=xxxx (The setting I have set is for 3GB)
7. Open the Skyrim Launcher and Disable Antialiasing and Anisotropic Filtering in the options menu
8. Have Fun!!

Uninstall:
Delete all ENB files

[url=http://www.modwat.ch/u/VenomShade]My Mod List

[/url]Change Log:
Tribus
Reworked the lighting for more compatibility with COT
Added support for RLO
Tweaked weather files by DrDocter for better lighting during those weathers


Duo
Fixed the brightness during the day.
Added AO


Credits:
Boris Voronstov - Making ENBseries
DrDocter - Making weather files
Unreal's screenshots
author: VenomShade
